and you didn’t jar the client where you changed the ip.[/quote]

The files i jared are the following

[ul][li]javazoom folder[/li]
[li]sign folder[/li]
[li]and all of the class files[/li][/ul]

according to this video
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SbURxHKLnm4[/youtube]

@xX4m4zingXx wrote:

probably you changed the ip in the unzipped client(unzipped from jar)
and you didn’t jar the client where you changed the ip.

item.title: Solved
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

[quote=“Jayden., post:6, topic:538128”][quote author=MrFun link=topic=656948.msg4396372#msg4396372 date=1389237756]

UID mabye?

you mean this?..GUI.java

[code] private Gui(String args[])
{
super();
try
{

		System.out.println("connecting to update server");
		Serverip = "";
		sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(Serverip));
		initUI();
	}
	catch (Exception ex)
	{
		ex.printStackTrace();
	}
}[/code]

[/quote]

Nope.

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/265734-pi-preventing-cheat-clients.html[/quote]
this isn’t pi…what gives it, it’s name…“non” aka nonrename aka delta

item.title: Solved
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

Bl3nd:

Correct me if I’m wrong, maybe start the server first before loading the client? I’m thinking if you don’t run the server first, the client doesn’t search for running servers that you may have ran after the client.

Okaay just tried that and didn’t work…and I don’t think that would even matter lol since I start of the unjar client before the source all the time, while im deving the source lol
